title: Doing Business with 4Change Energy Just Got Even Easier
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 1:34 PM Companies mentioned in this article: 4Change Energy 
DALLAS, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 4Change Energy has just made it even easier for customers to manage their accounts and refer their friends while they are on the go. 
With a redesigned mobile website, Texans can sign up for electricity service or access their current 4Change Energy accounts within minutes. Customers also can set or change their 4Change Energy charitable cause with a click on their mobile device. 
"Our savvy customers are constantly on the go and many don't have the time to place a call to sign up for service or to manage their existing accounts," said John Geary, president of 4Change Energy. "Our website was redesigned with the primary goal of making it fast and easy for customers to do business with 4Change. And because the website is always available, our customers can use their smart phone to quickly add new service, review and pay a bill, or refer friends when it's convenient for them, not just during our traditional business hours." 
Since it opened for business, 4Change Energy's primary focus has been to be an easy, online-friendly experience and has used online marketing and word-of-mouth efforts to get and keep customers. The company gives customers a $25 VisaÂ® gift card for every qualified customer they refer and those new customers also receive a $25 Visa gift card. 
"With our improved mobile website, customers can share their unique referral code with friends and family while they are out and about, and their friends can immediately review plans and sign up without having to place a single phone call," Geary said. "It doesn't get easier than that; you get a great electricity rate in Texas and a referral bonus." 
Visit 4Change Energy from any connected device and get started today. 
Connect with 4Change Energy on Facebook , Twitter and Google+ ! 
About 4Change Energy: 4Change Energy, built on decades of industry experience, innovation and inspiration, is founded on the idea that electricity service should be affordable and support those in great need in our communities. It offers low-price service plans, simplified customer service and a commitment to support local charities.
